dcterms:description: The MIT Places dataset is used for scene recognition and contains a large variety of images categorized by scene types, which helps in training in-painting networks to understand context and fill in missing parts of images.
dcterms:title: MIT Places

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: Celeb-A is a large-scale face attribute dataset with more than 200,000 celebrity images, each annotated with 40 attribute labels, which is used to train in-painting networks to better reconstruct facial features.
dcterms:title: Celeb-A
